item.title: Kaia add a quote by Jeanne Marie Laskas
item.description: "Dreams are matters of the heart, things that pull you along as if they have hooked you someplace deep inside." -- Jeanne Marie Laskas

item.title: Kaia add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Kaia add a quote by Lois Duncan
item.description: "Life continues, and we all of us keep changing and building, toward what we cannot know." -- Lois Duncan

item.title: Kaia add a quote by David Clement-Davies
item.description: "But of all the animals, man holds the fate of the world in his hands." -- David Clement-Davies

item.title: Kaia add a quote by Jerome Bruner
item.description: "We are storytelling creatures, and as children we acquire language to tell those stories that we have inside us." -- Jerome Bruner

item.title: Kaia add a quote by Toni Morrison
item.description: "Sifting daylight dissolves the memory, turns it into dust motes floating in light." -- Toni Morrison

item.title: Kaia add a quote by Edith Wharton
item.description: "I swear I only want to hear about you, to know what you've been doing. It's a hundred years since we've met-it may be another hundred before we meet again." -- Edith Wharton

item.title: Kaia add a quote by Edith Wharton
item.description: "Everything may be labelled- but everybody is not." -- Edith Wharton

item.title: Kaia add a quote by Edith Wharton
item.description: "It's you who are telling me; opening my eyes to things I'd looked at so long that I'd ceased to see them." -- Edith Wharton

item.title: Kaia add a quote by Ellen Hopkins
item.description: "Grandma once told me it's easy to overthink love, to dissect it and question it until it is no more." -- Ellen Hopkins

item.title: Kaia add a quote by Ellen Hopkins
item.description: "Love means holding on to someone just as hard as you can because if you don't, one blink and they might disappear...forever." -- Ellen Hopkins

item.title: Kaia add a quote by Gabrielle Zevin
item.description: "If you are going to forgive a person, Liz decides, it is best to do it sooner rather than later. Later, Liz knows from experience, could be sooner than you thought." -- Gabrielle Zevin

item.title: Kaia add a quote by Laurie Halse Anderson
item.description: "I picked up one of the books and flipped through it. Don't get me wrong, I like reading. But some books should come with warning labels: Caution: contains characters and plots guaranteed to induce sleepiness. Do not attempt to operate heavy machinery after ingesting more than one chapter. Has been known to cause blindness, seizures and a terminal loathing of literature. Should only be taken under the supervision of a highly trained English teacher. Preferably one who grades on the curve." -- Laurie Halse Anderson

item.title: Kaia add a quote by Laurie Halse Anderson
item.description: "And then a new screen, one I had never seen before, never even heard of popped up. It gave me a choice. I could become the new Lord of Darkness myself, or I could take a gamble and be reincarnated. I chose wisely." -- Laurie Halse Anderson

item.title: Kaia add a quote by Edward Bloor
item.description: "I had no night terrors. Maybe when your real life becomes the terror, there's just nothing left to dream about" -- Edward Bloor

item.title: Kaia add a quote by David Clement-Davies
Kaia add a quote by Gabrielle Zevin
item.description: "Sorry but nothing of much importance ever happened to me...I'm just a girl who forgot to look both ways before crossing the street." -- Gabrielle Zevin

item.title: Kaia add a quote by Gabrielle Zevin
item.description: "Betty inhales sharply, 'It's just I thought I had lost you forever.' Oh, Betty, don't you know there's no such thing as forever?" -- Gabrielle Zevin

item.title: Kaia add a quote by Gabrielle Zevin
item.description: "On, there are so many lives. How we wish we could live them concurrently instead of one by one by one. We could select the best pieces of each, stringing them together like a strand of pearls. But that's not how it works. A human life is a beautiful mess." -- Gabrielle Zevin

item.title: Kaia add a quote by Gabrielle Zevin
item.description: "On Elsewhere we fool ourselves into thinking we know what will be just because we know the amount of time we have left. We know this, but we never really know what will be. We never know what will happen..." -- Gabrielle Zevin

item.title: Kaia add a quote by Gabrielle Zevin
item.description: "There is no difference in quality between a life lived forward and a life lived backwards, she thinks. She had come to love this backward life. It was, after all, the only life she had." -- Gabrielle Zevin

item.title: Kaia add a quote by Gabrielle Zevin
item.description: "People, you'll find, aren't usually all good or bad. Sometimes they're just a little bit good and a whole lot bad. And sometimes they're mostly good with a dash of bad. And most of us, well, we fall in the middle somewhere." -- Gabrielle Zevin

item.title: Kaia add a quote by Cassandra Clare
Kaia add a quote by Cassandra Clare
Kaia add a quote by Cassandra Clare
Kaia add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "But of the tree of the knowledge of good and evil, thou shalt not eat it; for in the day that thou eatest thereof thou shalt surely die." -- Anonymous

item.title: Kaia add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Kaia add a quote by Neal Shusterman
item.description: "Stupid dreams. Even the good ones are bad, because they remind you how poorly reality measures up." -- Neal Shusterman

item.title: Kaia add a quote by Neal Shusterman
item.description: "Sure, I can talk like you, but I choose not to, It's like an art, you know? Picasso had to prove to the world he could paint the right way, before he goes putting both eyes on the side of a face... See if you paint wrong because that's the best you can do, you just a chump. But you do it because you want to? Then you're an artist...You can take that to the grave and dig it up when you need it." -- Neal Shusterman

item.title: Kaia add a quote by Neal Shusterman
item.description: "Normally Connor would walk away from a conversation like this. His life is about tangibles: things you can see, hear and touch. God, souls, and all that has always been like a secret in a black box he couldn't see into, so it was easier just to leave it alone. Only now, he's inside the black box." -- Neal Shusterman
